transliteration: sherab parol chinpa pün sum tsok

transliteration: jitar chomden sherab parol chin

transliteration: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok

transliteration: tab kyi parol chinpa pün sum tsok
english: Accomplished the transcendent perfection of methods.

transliteration: jitar chomden tab kyi parol chin
english: Just as the Blessed One mastered methodical perfection,

transliteration: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok

transliteration: tukjé chenpo kang nyi chokgyur pa

transliteration: tob kyi parol chinpa pün sum tsok
english: Accomplished the transcendent perfection of strength.

transliteration: jitar chomden tob kyi parol chin
english: Just as the Blessed One mastered strength’s perfection,

transliteration: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok

transliteration: tukjé chenpo kang nyi chokgyur pa

transliteration: mönlam parol chinpa pün sum tsok
english: Accomplished the transcendent perfection of aspiration.

transliteration: jitar chomden mönlam parol chin
english: Just as the Blessed One mastered aspiration’s perfection,

transliteration: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok
english: May I and others attain similar mastery before too long.

transliteration: tukjé chenpo kang nyi chokgyur pa
english: The great compassionate one, supreme among humans,

transliteration: yeshe parol chinpa pün sum tsok
english: Accomplished the transcendent perfection of wisdom.

transliteration: jitar chomden yeshe parol chin
english: Just as the Blessed One mastered wisdom’s perfection,

transliteration: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok
english: May I and others attain similar mastery before too long.

transliteration: tukjé chenpo kang nyi chokgyur pa
english: The great compassionate one, supreme among humans,

transliteration: chökü parol chinpa pün sum tsok
english: Accomplished the transcendent perfection of dharmakāya.

transliteration: jitar chomden chökü parol chin
english: Just as the Blessed One mastered dharmakāya’s perfection,

transliteration: dakzhen ringpor mi tok dendrar shok
english: May I and others attain similar mastery before too long.

transliteration: lamé lamé tukjé dang
english: Through the compassion of the unsurpassable guru,

transliteration: gyal dang gyalsé ranggyal dang
english: And the blessings and truth of the victorious ones,

transliteration: drachom denpé jinlab kyi
english: Their heirs, and the pratyekabuddhas and arhats,

transliteration: jitar mön zhin drub gyur chik
english: May this be accomplished according to our aspirations.

transliteration: böké du pakpa jampé mönlam gyi gyalpo
english: The Noble Maitreya’s King of Aspirations

transliteration: sangye dang changchub sempa tamché la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to all buddhas and bodhisattvas!

transliteration: sangye kün la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to all buddhas!

transliteration: drangsong lha mik denpa yi
english: Homage to the bodhisattvas

transliteration: changchub sempa nam dang yang
english: Who possess the divine vision of seers,

transliteration: nyentö nam la chaktsal lo
english: And homage to the hearers as well.

transliteration: ngendro lé ni dok gyi ching
english: Homage to bodhicitta, the heart of awakening,

transliteration: tori lam ni rab tön la
english: That keeps the lower realms at bay,

transliteration: gashi mepar dren gyipa
english: That shows us the way to the higher realms,

transliteration: changchub sem la chaktsal lo
english: And leads us to a state beyond ageing and death.

transliteration: sem kyi wang du gyurpé na
english: I go before the awakened ones

transliteration: dak gi dikpa chigyi pa
english: To confess any and all misdeeds

transliteration: sangye chen ngar chi né su
english: That I may have committed

transliteration: dak gi dedak shakpar gyi
english: While under the sway of mind.

transliteration: ganglé nampa sum gang gi
english: May all merit accrued

transliteration: sönam tsok ni kyepa dé
english: Through the three kinds of actions

transliteration: dak gi künkhyen sabön té
english: Become a seed for my omniscience

transliteration: dak gi changchub mizé shok
english: And inexhaustible awakening.

transliteration: chok chu dak gi zhingkham su
english: The buddhas are aware and rejoice in any offering

transliteration: sangye chöpa gang jungwa
english: Made to the awakened ones

transliteration: sangye khyenpé yirangwa
english: Throughout the buddhafields of the ten directions,

transliteration: dela dak ni yi rang ngo
english: And so do I too rejoice.

transliteration: dikpa tamché shakpar gyi
english: I hereby confess all negative actions.

transliteration: sönam kün la yi rang ngo
english: I hereby rejoice in everything meritorious.

transliteration: sangye kün la chaktsal la
english: I hereby pay homage to all buddhas.

transliteration: dak ni yeshe chok tob shok
english: May I attain the supreme wisdom state.

transliteration: chok chu dak gi chok nam na
english: I exhort each and every bodhisattva

transliteration: sa chu dak la nepa yi
english: Dwelling in the ten directions

transliteration: changchub sempa changchub chok
english: And upon the ten bodhisattva levels

transliteration: tsanggya gyipar kulma deb
english: To awaken now to supreme enlightenment.

transliteration: changchub dampar sangyé shing
english: And, as they awaken to sublime enlightenment,

transliteration: dé dang chepé dü tul né
english: May they turn the wheel of Dharma

transliteration: sokchak kün la men ledu
english: So as to tame the demons and all their hordes,

transliteration: chö kyi khorlo kor gyur chik
english: And bring benefit to every living being.

transliteration: chö nga chenpö dra yi ni
english: May the beat of the great drum of Dharma

transliteration: dukngal semchen tar gyi shok
english: Free beings from their suffering.

transliteration: kalpa jewa samyé su
english: For unimaginable billions of eons,

transliteration: chö tön dzé ching zhuk gyur chik
english: May the awakened ones teach Dharma and remain.

transliteration: döpé dam du jing gyur ching
english: I beg you, best of humans,

transliteration: sepé sebü dam chingpa
english: Look upon us drowning in the mud of desires,

transliteration: chingwa kün gyi ching dak la
english: Bound by the ropes of craving,

transliteration: kang nyi chok nam zik su sol
english: And in other ways absolutely trapped.

transliteration: sem kyi drimar gyurpa la
english: May the buddhas not level criticism

transliteration: sangye nam ni mö mi dzé
english: Against those of impure minds.

transliteration: semchen nam la jam tukden
english: Instead, may they give love to beings

transliteration: sipé tso lé drolwar shok
english: And free them from the ocean of existence!

transliteration: dzokpé sangye gang zhuk dang
english: May I train in the likeness

transliteration: gangdak dé dang majönpa
english: Of the perfectly awakened buddhas

transliteration: dedak jesu dak lob ching
english: Of the present, past, and future,

transliteration: changchub chepa chö gyur chik
english: And uphold the bodhisattva conduct.

transliteration: parol chin druk dzok gyi né
english: May I bring to completion the six perfections

transliteration: dro druk semchen tar gyi shok
english: And lead, to the end, the six classes of beings.

transliteration: ngönshé drukpo ngön gyi né
english: May I manifest at last the six super-knowledges

transliteration: lamé changchub rek gyur chik
english: And reach the unsurpassed state of awakening.

transliteration: makyepa dang minjung dang
english: May I realize the truth of emptiness

transliteration: rangzhin ma chi né ma chi
english: In which all is birthless and non-arising,

transliteration: namrik ma chi ngö ma chi
english: Without intrinsic nature, without location,

transliteration: tongpé chö ni tokpar shok
english: With neither mental process nor substance.

transliteration: sangye drangsong chenpo tar
english: Just like the great sage, the Buddha himself,

transliteration: semchen ma chi sok ma chi
english: May I realize the truth of selflessness

transliteration: gangzak ma chi so ma chi
english: In which beings do not exist, nor any living things,

transliteration: dak machipé chö tok shok
english: Nor an individual, nor any kind of person.

transliteration: dakdzin dakgir dzinpa yi
english: May I practice generosity free from stinginess

transliteration: ngöpo kün la mi nepar
english: Without entertaining any notion of substantiality,

transliteration: semchen kün la pen ledu
english: Nor any belief in the self nor egoistical clinging,

transliteration: serna ma chi jin tong shok
english: So that the benefit may reach all beings.

transliteration: ngöpo ngöpor machipé
english: Since material things do not exist concretely,

transliteration: dak gi longchö lhündrub shok
english: May all my needs be spontaneously met.

transliteration: ngöpo tamché nam jikpé
english: Since all material things are subject to decay,

transliteration: jinpé parol chin dzok shok
english: May I master the perfection of generosity.

transliteration: trim kyi tsultrim kyönmé ching
english: With discipline completely flawless,

transliteration: tsultrim nampar dak dangden
english: Discipline that is perfectly pure,

transliteration: lomsem mepé tsultrim kyi
english: And discipline devoid of arrogance,

transliteration: tsultrim parol chin dzok shok
english: May I master the perfection of discipline.

transliteration: sa am yangna chu am mé
english: With absence of anger––in other words, with patience,

transliteration: lung gi kham tar mi né shing
english: Akin to how the earth, water, and fire elements,

transliteration: zöpa am trowa ma chipar
english: And the wind element as well, dwell not anywhere,

transliteration: zöpé parol chin dzok shok
english: May I complete the perfection of patience.

transliteration: tsöndrü tsampé tsöndrü kyi
english: With persistent application of diligence

transliteration: ten tro lelo ma chi shing
english: May I be ever joyful and free from laziness,

transliteration: tob dang denpé lü sem kyi
english: And with strength in both body and mind

transliteration: tsöndrü parol chin dzok shok
english: May I complete the perfection of diligence.

transliteration: gyuma tabü tingdzin dang
english: With illusion-like meditative concentration,

transliteration: pawar drowé tingdzin dang
english: And bravery-inspiring meditative concentration,

transliteration: dorjé tabü tingdzin gyi
english: And vajra-like meditative concentration,

transliteration: samten parol chin dzok shok
english: May I master the perfection of meditation.

transliteration: nampar tarpé go sum dang
english: Acting with the three gates of liberation,

transliteration: dü sum nyampa nyi dang yang
english: With the equality of the three times,

transliteration: rik sum ngönsum gyipa yi
english: And the threefold knowledge,

transliteration: sherab parol chin dzok shok
english: May I master the perfection of wisdom.

transliteration: sangye kün gyi ngakpa dang
english: May I be praised by all buddhas

transliteration: ö dang ziji barwa dang
english: As I beam with light and splendour,

transliteration: changchub sempé tsöndrü kyi
english: And with the diligence of a bodhisattva

transliteration: dak gi sampa dzok gyur chik
english: May all my aims be accomplished.

transliteration: detar chepa chö jé ching
english: As I engage in this very conduct,

transliteration: jampa drak dang denpa yi
english: May I, the one known as Maitreya,

transliteration: parol chin druk dzok gyi né
english: Bring to completion the six perfections

transliteration: sa chupo la rabtu né
english: And reach the ten bodhisattva levels.

transliteration: di né shi pö gyur ma tak
english: At the very moment I pass away,

transliteration: ganden kyé né yiga bar
english: May I joyfully take rebirth in Tuṣita Heaven

transliteration: nyurdu jam gön nyé jé né
english: And, swiftly delighting the Lord Maitreya,

transliteration: changchub lungten tobpar shok
english: Receive his prophecy of my awakening.

transliteration: jampal zhönnur gyurpa la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to Mañjuśrī, the youthful!

transliteration: jinyé su dak chok chü jikten na
english: To all the buddhas, the lions of the human race,

transliteration: dü sum shekpa mi yi sengé kün
english: In all directions of the universe, through past and present and future:

transliteration: dak gi malü dedak tamché la
english: To every single one of you, I bow in homage;

transliteration: lü dang ngak yi dangwé chak gyi o
english: Devotion fills my body, speech and mind.

transliteration: zangpo chöpé mönlam tob dak gi
english: Through the power of this prayer, aspiring to Good Action,

transliteration: gyalwa tamché yi kyi ngönsum du
english: All the victorious ones appear, vivid here before my mind

transliteration: zhing gi dul nyé lü rab tüpa yi
english: And I multiply my body as many times as atoms in the universe,

transliteration: gyalwa kün la rabtu chaktsal lo
english: Each one bowing in prostration to all the buddhas.

transliteration: dul chik teng na dul nyé sangye nam
english: In every atom preside as many buddhas as there are atoms,

transliteration: sangye sé kyi ü na zhukpa dak
english: And around them, all their bodhisattva heirs:

transliteration: detar chö kyi ying nam malüpa
english: And so I imagine them filling

transliteration: tamché gyalwa dak gi gangwar mö
english: Completely the entire space of reality.

transliteration: dedak ngakpa mizé gyatso nam
english: Saluting them with an endless ocean of praise,

transliteration: yang kyi yenlak gyatsö dra kün gyi
english: With the sounds of an ocean of different melodies

transliteration: gyalwa kün gyi yönten rab jö ching
english: I sing of the buddhas’ noble qualities,

transliteration: dewar shekpa tamché dak gi tö
english: And praise all those who have gone to perfect bliss.

transliteration: metok dampa trengwa dampa dang
english: To every buddha, I make offerings:

transliteration: silnyen nam dang jukpa duk chok dang
english: Of the loveliest flowers, of beautiful garlands,

transliteration: marmé chok dang dukpö dampa yi
english: Of music and perfumed ointments, the best of parasols,

transliteration: gyalwa dedak la ni chöpar gyi
english: The brightest lamps and finest incense.

transliteration: naza dampa nam dang dri chok dang
english: To every buddha, I make offerings:

transliteration: chema purma rirab nyampa dang
english: Exquisite garments and the most fragrant scents,

transliteration: köpa khyepar pakpé chok kün gyi
english: Powdered incense, heaped as high as Mount Meru,

transliteration: gyalwa dedak la ni chöpar gyi
english: Arranged in perfect symmetry.

transliteration: chöpa gang nam lamé gya chewa
english: Then the vast and unsurpassable offerings—

transliteration: dedak gyalwa tamché la yang mö
english: Inspired by my devotion to all the buddhas, and

transliteration: zangpo chö la depé tob dak gi
english: Moved by the power of my faith in Good Actions—

transliteration: gyalwa kün la chaktsal chöpar gyi
english: I prostrate and offer to all you victorious ones.

transliteration: döchak zhedang timuk wang gi ni
english: Whatever negative acts I have committed,

transliteration: lü dang ngak dang dezhin yi kyi kyang
english: While driven by desire, hatred and ignorance,

transliteration: dikpa dak gi gyipa chi chipa
english: With my body, my speech and also with my mind,

transliteration: dedak tamché dak gi sosor shak
english: Before you, I confess and purify each and every one.

transliteration: chok chü gyalwa kün dang sangye sé
english: With a heart full of delight, I rejoice at all the merits

transliteration: ranggyal nam dang lob dang mi lob dang
english: Of buddhas and bodhisattvas,

transliteration: drowa kün gyi sönam gangla yang
english: Pratyekabuddhas, those in training and the arhats beyond training,

transliteration: dedak kün gyi jesu dak yi rang
english: And every living being, throughout the entire universe.

transliteration: gang nam chok chü jikten drönma nam
english: You who are like beacons of light shining through the worlds,

transliteration: changchub rimpar sangye machak nyé
english: Who passed through the stages of enlightenment, to attain buddhahood, freedom from all attachment,

transliteration: gönpo dedak dak gi tamché la
english: I exhort you: all of you protectors,

transliteration: khorlo lanamepar korwar kul
english: Turn the unsurpassable wheel of Dharma.

transliteration: nya ngen da tön gang zhé dedak la
english: Joining my palms together, I pray

transliteration: drowa kün la pen zhing dewé chir
english: To you who intend to pass into nirvāṇa,

transliteration: kalpa zhing gi dul nyé zhukpar yang
english: Remain, for aeons as many as the atoms in this world,

transliteration: dak gi talmo rab jar solwar gyi
english: And bring well-being and happiness to all living beings.

transliteration: chaktsalwa dang chö ching shakpa dang
english: What little virtue I have gathered through my homage,

transliteration: jesu yi rang kul zhing solwa yi
english: Through offering, confession, and rejoicing,

transliteration: gewa chungzé dak gi chi sakpa
english: Through exhortation and prayer—all of it

transliteration: tamché dak gi changchub chir ngo o
english: I dedicate to the enlightenment of all beings!

transliteration: depé sangye nam dang chok chu yi
english: Let offerings be made to buddhas of the past,

transliteration: jikten dak na gang zhuk chöpar gyur
english: And all who now dwell throughout the ten directions of this universe!

transliteration: gangyang majön dedak rab nyurwar
english: Let all who are yet to come swiftly fulfil their wishes

transliteration: sam dzok changchub rimpar sangye chön
english: And attain the stages of enlightenment and buddhahood!

transliteration: chok chu galé zhing nam jinyepa
english: Let as many worlds as there are in all the ten directions

transliteration: dedak gyacher yongsu dakpar gyur
english: Transform into realms that are vast and utterly pure,

transliteration: changchub shingwang drung shek gyalwa dang
english: Filled with buddhas who have sat before the mighty bodhi tree,

transliteration: sangye sé kyi rabtu gangwar shok
english: Around them all their bodhisattva sons and daughters!

transliteration: chok chü semchen gang nam jinyé pa
english: Let as many sentient beings as there are in all the ten directions

transliteration: dedak taktu nemé dewar gyur
english: Live always and forever in happiness and health!

transliteration: drowa kün gyi chö kyi dön nam ni
english: Let all beings meet the Dharma

transliteration: tünpar gyur ching rewa ang drubpar shok
english: That befits them best! And so may all they hope for be fulfilled!

transliteration: changchub chöpa dak ni dak chö ching
english: As I practise the training for enlightenment,

transliteration: drowa küntu kyewa drenpar gyur
english: May I recall all my previous births,

transliteration: tserab küntu chipo kyewa na
english: And in my successive lives, through death and through rebirth,

transliteration: taktu dak ni rabtu jungwar shok
english: May I always renounce the worldly life!

transliteration: gyalwa kün gyi jesu lob gyur té
english: Training in the footsteps of all the victorious buddhas,

transliteration: zangpo chöpa yongsu dzok jé ching
english: May I bring Good Actions to perfection,

transliteration: tsultrim chöpa drimé yong dakpa
english: And my moral conduct be taintless and pure,

transliteration: taktu manyam kyönmé chöpar shok
english: Never lapsing, and always free from fault!

transliteration: lha yi ké dang lu dang nöjin ké
english: In the language of the gods, nāgas, and yakṣas,

transliteration: drulbum dak dang mi yi ké nam dang
english: In the language of demons and of humans too,

transliteration: drowa kün gyi dra nam ji tsampar
english: In however many kinds of speech there may be—

transliteration: tamché ké du dak gi chö ten to
english: I shall proclaim the Dharma in the language of all!

transliteration: dé shing parol chin la rab tsön té
english: Taming my mind, and striving in the pāramitās,

transliteration: changchub sem ni namyang jé magyur
english: I will never forget the bodhicitta;

transliteration: dikpa gang nam dribpar gyurpa dak
english: May all my harmful actions and the obscurations they cause

transliteration: dedak malü yongsu jangwar shok
english: Be completely purified, every single one!

transliteration: lé dang nyönmong dü kyi lé nam lé
english: May I be freed from karma, harmful emotions, and the work of negativity,

transliteration: drol zhing jikten drowa nam su yang
english: And act for all beings in the world,

transliteration: jitar pemo chü michakpa zhin
english: Just like the lotus flower to which mud and water cannot cling,

transliteration: nyida namkhar tokpamé tar ché
english: Or sun and moon that course unhindered through the sky.

transliteration: zhing gi khyön dang chok nam chi tsampar
english: Throughout the reach and range of the entire universe

transliteration: ngensong dukngal rabtu zhiwar jé
english: I shall pacify completely the suffering of all the lower realms,

transliteration: dewa dak la drowa kün gö ching
english: I shall lead all beings to happiness,

transliteration: drowa tamché la ni penpar ché
english: And work for the ultimate benefit of each and every one!

transliteration: changchub chöpa yongsu dzokjé ching
english: I shall bring enlightened action to perfection,

transliteration: semchen dak gi chö dang tünpar juk
english: Serve beings so as to suit their needs,

transliteration: zangpo chöpa dak ni rab tön ching
english: Teach them to accomplish Good Actions,

transliteration: ma ong kalpa küntu chöpar gyur
english: And continue this, throughout all the aeons to come!

transliteration: dak gi chö dang tsungpar gang chöpa
english: May I always meet and be accompanied by

transliteration: dedak dang ni taktu drokpar shok
english: Those whose actions accord with mine;

transliteration: lü dang ngak nam dang ni sem kyi kyang
english: And in body, speech and mind as well,

transliteration: chöpa dak dang mönlam chik tu ché
english: May our actions and aspirations always be one!

transliteration: dak la penpar döpé drokpo dak
english: May I always meet spiritual friends

transliteration: zangpo chöpa rabtu tönpa nam
english: Who long to be of true help to me,

transliteration: dedak dang yang taktu trepar shok
english: And who teach me the Good Actions;

transliteration: dedak dak gi namyang yi miyung
english: Never will I disappoint them!

transliteration: sangye sé kyi korwé gönpo nam
english: May I always behold the buddhas, here before my eyes,

transliteration: ngönsum taktu dak gi gyalwa ta
english: And around them all their bodhisattva sons and daughters.

transliteration: ma ong kalpa küntu mikyowar
english: Without ever tiring, throughout all the aeons to come,

transliteration: dedak la yang chöpa gyacher gyi
english: May the offerings I make them be endless and vast!

transliteration: gyalwa nam kyi dampé chö dzin ching
english: May I maintain the sacred teachings of the buddhas,

transliteration: changchub chöpa küntu nangwar jé
english: And cause enlightened action to appear;

transliteration: zangpo chöpa nampar jongwa yang
english: May I train to perfection in Good Actions,

transliteration: ma ong kalpa küntu chepar gyi
english: And practise these in every age to come!

transliteration: sipa tamché du yang khorwa na
english: As I wander through all states of samsaric existence,

transliteration: sönam yeshe dak ni mizé nyé
english: May I gather inexhaustible merit and wisdom,

transliteration: tab dang sherab tingdzin namtar dang
english: And so become an inexhaustible treasury of noble qualities—

transliteration: yönten kün gyi mizé dzö du gyur
english: Of skill and discernment, samādhi and liberation!

transliteration: dul chik teng na dul nyé zhing nam té
english: In a single atom may I see as many pure realms as atoms in the universe:

transliteration: zhing der sam gyi mikhyab sangye nam
english: And in each realm, buddhas beyond all imagining,

transliteration: sangye sé kyi ü na zhukpa la
english: Encircled by all their bodhisattva heirs.

transliteration: changchub chepa chö ching tawar gyi
english: Along with them, may I perform the actions of enlightenment!

transliteration: detar malü tamché chok su yang
english: And so, in each direction, everywhere,

transliteration: tra tsam khyön la dü sum tsé nyé kyi
english: Even on the tip of a hair, may I see an ocean of buddhas—

transliteration: sangye gyatso zhing nam gyatso dang
english: All to come in past, present and future—in an ocean of pure realms,

transliteration: kalpa gyatso chö ching rabtu juk
english: And throughout an ocean of aeons, may I enter into enlightened action in each and every one!

transliteration: sung chik yenlak gyatsö draké kyi
english: Each single word of a buddha’s speech, that voice with its ocean of qualities,

transliteration: gyalwa kün yang yenlak namdakpa
english: Bears all the purity of the speech of all the buddhas,

transliteration: drowa kün gyi sampa jizhin yang
english: Sounds that harmonize with the minds of all living beings:

transliteration: sangye sung la taktu jukpar gyi
english: May I always be engaged with the speech of the buddhas!

transliteration: dü sum shekpé gyalwa tamché dak
english: With all the power of my mind, may I hear and realize

transliteration: khorlö tsul nam rabtu korwa yi
english: The inexhaustible melody of the teachings spoken by

transliteration: dedak gi yang sung yang mizé la
english: All the buddhas of past, present and future,

transliteration: lo yi tob kyi dak kyang rabtu juk
english: As they turn the wheels of Dharma!

transliteration: ma ong kalpa tamché jukpar yang
english: Just as the wisdom of the buddhas penetrates all future aeons,

transliteration: kechik chik gi dak kyang jukpar gyi
english: So may I too know them, instantly,

transliteration: gangyang kalpa dü sum tsé dedak
english: And in each fraction of an instant may I know

transliteration: kechik chashé kyi ni zhukpar ché
english: All that will ever be, in past, present and future!

transliteration: dü sum shekpa mi yi sengé gang
english: In an instant, may I behold all those who are the lions of the human race—

transliteration: dedak kechik chik la dak gi ta
english: The buddhas of past, present and future!

transliteration: taktu dedak gi ni chöyul la
english: May I always be engaged in the buddhas’ way of life and action,

transliteration: gyumar gyurpé namtar tob kyi juk
english: Through the power of liberation, where all is realized as like an illusion!

transliteration: gangyang dü sum dak gi zhing köpa
english: On a single atom, may I actually bring about

transliteration: dedak dul chik tengdu ngönpar drub
english: The entire array of pure realms of past, of present and future;

transliteration: detar malü chok nam tamché du
english: And then enter into those pure buddha realms

transliteration: gyalwa dak gi zhing nam kö la juk
english: In each atom, and in each and every direction.

transliteration: gangyang majön jikten drönma nam
english: When those who illuminate the world, still to come,

transliteration: dedak rimpar tsang gya khorlo kor
english: Gradually attain buddhahood, turn the Wheel of Dharma,

transliteration: nya ngen depa rabtu zhi ta tön
english: And demonstrate the final, profound peace of nirvāṇa:

transliteration: gönpo kün gyi drung du dak chi o
english: May I be always in their presence!

transliteration: küntu nyurwé dzutrul tob nam dang
english: Through the power of swift miracles,

transliteration: künné go yi tekpé tob dak dang
english: The power of the vehicle, like a doorway,

transliteration: küntu yönten chöpé tob nam dang
english: The power of conduct that possesses all virtuous qualities,

transliteration: küntu khyabpa jampa dak gi tob
english: The power of loving kindness, all-pervasive,

transliteration: künné gewé sönam tob dak dang
english: The power of merit that is totally virtuous,

transliteration: chakpa mepar gyurpé yeshe tob
english: The power of wisdom free from attachment, and

transliteration: sherab tab dang tingdzin tob dak gi
english: The powers of knowledge, skilful means and samādhi,

transliteration: changchub tob nam yangdak drubpar jé
english: May I perfectly accomplish the power of enlightenment!

transliteration: lé kyi tob nam yongsu dakjé ching
english: May I purify the power of karma;

transliteration: nyönmong tob nam küntu jompar jé
english: Destroy the power of harmful emotions;

transliteration: dü kyi tob nam tobmé rabjé ching
english: Render negativity utterly powerless;

transliteration: zangpo chöpé tob ni dzokpar gyi
english: And perfect the power of Good Actions!

transliteration: gangyang dü sum shekpé gyalwa yi
english: All the buddhas throughout the whole of time,

transliteration: changchub chöpé mönlam jedrak nam
english: Attained enlightenment through Good Actions, and

transliteration: zangpo chöpé changchub sangye né
english: Their prayers and aspirations for enlightened action:

transliteration: dé kün dak gi malü dzokpar gyi
english: May I fulfil them all completely!

transliteration: gyalwa kün gyi sé kyi tuwopa
english: The eldest of the sons of all the buddhas

transliteration: gang gi ming ni kuntuzang zheja
english: Is called Samantabhadra: ‘All-good’—

transliteration: khepa dé dang tsungpar chepé chir
english: So that I may act with a skill like his,

transliteration: gewa didak tamché rabtu ngo
english: I dedicate fully all these merits!

transliteration: lü dang ngak dang yi kyang namdak ching
english: To purify my body, my speech and my mind as well,

transliteration: chöpa namdak zhing nam yong dakpa
english: To purify my actions, and all realms,

transliteration: ngowa zangpo khepa chindrawa
english: May I be the equal of Samantabhadra

transliteration: dendrar dak kyang dé dang tsungpar shok
english: In his skill in good dedication!

transliteration: künné gewa zangpo chepé chir
english: In order to perform the full virtue of Good Actions,

transliteration: jampal gyi ni mönlam chepar gyi
english: I shall act according to Mañjuśrī's prayers of aspiration,

transliteration: ma ong kalpa küntu mikyowar
english: And without ever growing weary, in all the aeons to come,

transliteration: dé yi jawa malü dzokpar gyi
english: I shall perfectly fulfil every one of his aims!

transliteration: chöpa dak ni tsé yö magyur chik
english: Let my bodhisattva acts be beyond measure!

transliteration: yönten nam kyang tsé zung mepar shok
english: Let my enlightened qualities be measureless too!

transliteration: chöpa tsemepa la né né kyang
english: Keeping to this immeasurable activity,

transliteration: dedak trulpa tamché tsalwar gyi
english: May I accomplish all the miraculous powers of enlightenment!

transliteration: namkhé tartuk gyurpa ji tsampar
english: Sentient beings are as limitless

transliteration: semchen malü ta yang dezhin té
english: As the boundless expanse of space;

transliteration: ji tsam lé dang nyönmong tar gyurpa
english: So shall my prayers of aspiration for them

transliteration: dak gi mönlam ta yang detsam mo
english: Be as limitless as their karma and harmful emotions!

transliteration: gangyang chok chü zhing nam tayepa
english: Whoever hears this king of dedication prayers,

transliteration: rinchen gyen té gyalwa nam la pul
english: And yearns for supreme enlightenment,

transliteration: lha dang mi yi dewé chok nam kyang
english: Who even once arouses faith,

transliteration: zhing gi dul nyé kalpar pulwa bé
english: Will gain true merit greater still

transliteration: gang gi ngowé gyalpo di tö né
english: Than by offering the victorious buddhas

transliteration: changchub chok gi jesu rab mö shing
english: Infinite pure realms in every directions, all ornamented with jewels,

transliteration: len chik tsam yang depa kyepa na
english: Or offering them all the highest joys of gods and humans

transliteration: sönam dampé chok tu di gyur ro
english: For as many aeons as there are atoms in those realms.

transliteration: gang gi zangchö mönlam di tabpé
english: Whoever truly makes this Aspiration to Good Actions,

transliteration: dé ni ngensong tamché pongwar gyur
english: Will never again be born in lower realms;

transliteration: dé ni drokpo ngenpa pangwa yin
english: They will be free from harmful companions, and

transliteration: nangwa tayé deyang dé nyur tong
english: Soon behold the Buddha of Boundless Light.

transliteration: dedak nyepa rab nyé dewar tso
english: They will acquire all kind of benefits, and live in happiness;

transliteration: mitsé dir yang dedak lekpar ong
english: Even in this present life all will go well,

transliteration: kuntuzangpo deyang chindrawar
english: And before long,

transliteration: dedak ringpor mitok dezhin gyur
english: They will become just like Samantabhadra.

transliteration: tsammé ngapo dak gi dikpa nam
english: All negative acts—even the five of immediate retribution—

transliteration: gang gi mishe wang gi jepa dak
english: Whatever they have committed in the grip of ignorance,

transliteration: dé yi zangpo chöpa di jö na
english: Will soon be completely purified,

transliteration: nyurdu malü yongsu jangwar gyur
english: If they recite this Aspiration to Good Actions.

transliteration: yeshe dang ni zuk dang tsen nam dang
english: They will possess perfect wisdom, beauty, and excellent signs,

transliteration: rik dang khadok nam dang denpar gyur
english: Be born in a good family, and with a radiant appearance.

transliteration: dü dang mutek mangpö dé mitub
english: Demons and heretics will never harm them,

transliteration: jikten sumpo kün na ang chöpar gyur
english: And all three worlds will honour them with offerings.

transliteration: changchub shingwang drung du dé nyur dro
english: They will quickly go beneath the bodhi-tree,

transliteration: song né semchen pen chir der duk té
english: And there, they will sit, to benefit all sentient beings, then

transliteration: changchub sangye khorlo rabtu kor
english: Awaken into enlightenment, turn the wheel of Dharma,

transliteration: dü nam dé dang chepa tamché tul
english: And tame Māra with all his hordes.

transliteration: gangyang zangpo chöpé mönlam di
english: The full result of keeping, teaching, or reading

transliteration: changwa dang ni tön tam lok na yang
english: This Prayer of Aspiration to Good Actions

transliteration: dé yi nampar minpa ang sangye khyen
english: Is known to the buddhas alone:

transliteration: changchub chok la somnyi majé chik
english: Have no doubt: supreme enlightenment will be yours!

transliteration: jampal pawö jitar khyenpa dang
english: Just as the bodhisattva Mañjuśrī attained omniscience,

transliteration: kuntuzangpo deyang dezhin té
english: And Samantabhadra too

transliteration: dedak kün gyi jesu dak lob chir
english: All these merits now I dedicate

transliteration: gewa didak tamché rabtu ngo
english: To train and follow in their footsteps.

transliteration: dü sum shekpé gyalwa tamché kyi
english: As all the victorious buddhas of past, present and future

transliteration: ngowa gangla chok tu ngakpa dé
english: Praise dedication as supreme,

transliteration: dak gi gewé tsawa di kün kyang
english: So now I dedicate all these roots of virtue

transliteration: zangpo chö chir rabtu ngowar gyi
english: For all beings to perfect Good Actions.

transliteration: dak ni chiwé dü jé gyurpa na
english: When it is time for me to die,

transliteration: dribpa tamché dak ni chir sal té
english: Let all that obscures me fade away, so

transliteration: ngönsum nangwa tayé dé tong né
english: I look on Amitābha, there in person,

transliteration: dewachen gyi zhing der rabtu dro
english: And go at once to his pure land of Sukhāvatī.

transliteration: der song né ni mönlam didak kyang
english: In that pure land, may I actualize every single one

transliteration: tamché malü ngön du gyurwar shok
english: Of all these aspirations!

transliteration: dedak malü dak gi yongsu kang
english: May I fulfil them, each and every one,

transliteration: jikten jisi semchen penpar gyi
english: And bring help to beings for as long as the universe remains!

transliteration: gyalwé kyilkhor zang zhing gawa der
english: Born there in a beautiful lotus flower,

transliteration: pemo dampa shintu dzé lé kyé
english: In that excellent and joyous buddha realm,

transliteration: nangwa tayé gyalwé ngönsum du
english: May the Buddha Amitābha himself

transliteration: lungtenpa yang dak gi der tob shok
english: Grant me the prophecy foretelling my enlightenment!

transliteration: der ni dak gi lungten rab tob né
english: Having received the prophecy there,

transliteration: trulpa mangpo jewa trak gya yi
english: With my billions of emanations,

transliteration: lo yi tob kyi chok chu nam su yang
english: Sent out through the power of my mind,

transliteration: semchen nam la penpa mangpo gyi
english: May I bring enormous benefit to sentient beings, in all the ten directions!

transliteration: zangpo chöpé mönlam tabpa yi
english: Through whatever small virtues I have gained

transliteration: gewa chungzé dak gi chi sakpa
english: By reciting this “Aspiration to Good Actions”,

transliteration: dé ni drowé mönlam gewa nam
english: May the virtuous wishes of all beings’ prayers and aspirations

transliteration: kechik chik gi tamché jorwar shok
english: All be instantly accomplished!

transliteration: gangyang zangpo chöpa di ngöpé
english: Through the true and boundless merit

transliteration: sönam tayé dampa gang tob dé
english: Attained by dedicating this “Aspiration to Good Actions”,

transliteration: drowa dukngal chuwor jingwa nam
english: May all those now drowning in the ocean of suffering,

transliteration: öpakmepé né rab tobpar shok
english: Reach the supreme realm of Amitābha!

transliteration: mönlam gyalpo didak chok gi tso
english: May this King of Aspirations bring about

transliteration: tayé drowa kün la pen jé ching
english: The supreme aim and benefit of all infinite sentient beings;

transliteration: kuntuzangpö gyenpé zhung drub té
english: May they perfect what is described in this holy prayer, uttered by Samantabhadra!

transliteration: ngensong né nam malü tongpar shok
english: May the lower realms be entirely emptied!

transliteration: sangye ku sum nyepé jinlab dang
english: By the blessings of the buddhas who have attained the three kāyas,

transliteration: chönyi mingyur denpé jinlab dang
english: And the unchanging truth of reality

transliteration: gendün miché dünpé jinlab kyi
english: As well as the unwavering aspirations of the Saṅgha,

transliteration: jitar ngö zhin mönlam drubpar shok
english: May all the aspirations and dedication prayers be fulfilled!

transliteration: chomden nampar zik ni gyalrik ziji chen
english: The bhagavat Vipaśyin, majestic and of the warrior caste,

transliteration: tselo gyé tri dü na drongkhyer dzeden du
english: Was born in the city called Beautiful when humans lived for 80,000 years,

transliteration: shi ri sha yi shingdrung ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath a śirīṣa tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: deshek tsuktor ngawa gyal rik dzutrul chen
english: The sugata Śikhin, a miracle-worker of the warrior caste,

transliteration: tselo dün tri dü na su ké drongkhyer du
english: Was born in the city of Suka when humans lived for 70,000 years,

transliteration: shing chok sün dhé shingdrung ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath a sundha tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: gyalwa tamché kyobpa gyalrik lodrö chen
english: The conqueror Viśvabhū, intelligent and of the warrior caste,

transliteration: tselo druk tri dü na drongkhyer nyammé du
english: Was born in the city called Matchless when humans lived for 60,000 years,

transliteration: shing chok salé drung du ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath a sāla tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: tubpa khorwa jik ni tobden dramzé rik
english: The sage Krakucchandra, powerful and of the brahmin caste,

transliteration: tselo zhi tri dü na drongkhyer dzeden du
english: Was born in the city called Beautiful when humans lived for 40,000 years,

transliteration: shi ri sha yi shingdrung ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath a śirīṣa tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: drenpa sertub labpa chokden dramzé rik
english: The guide Kanakamuni, powerful and of the brahmin caste,

transliteration: tselo sum tri dü na drongkhyer deden du
english: Was born in the city called Joyous when humans lived for 30,000 years,

transliteration: u dum ba ré shingdrung ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath an uḍumbara tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: kyobpa ösung gyalrik lamé yönten chen
english: The protector Kāśyapa, unsurpassed in qualities and of the warrior caste,

transliteration: tselo nyitri dü na ba ra na si ru
english: Was born in the city called Vārāṇasī when humans lived for 20,000 years,

transliteration: nya gro dha yi shing drung ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath a nyagrodha tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: dro gön shakya tubpa gyalrik tsöndrü chen
english: The lord of living beings Śākyamuni, diligent and of the warrior caste,

transliteration: tselo gyawé dü na serkyé drongkhyer du
english: Was born in the city called Kapilavastu when humans lived for 100 years,

transliteration: a shatta yi shingdrung ngönpar sangyé pa
english: And attained full enlightenment beneath an aśvattha tree—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of this sugata abound here and now!

transliteration: sangye rab dün tashi pünsum tsokpa gang
english: The abundant auspiciousness of these seven successive buddhas,

transliteration: chok dü kün gyi deshek jinlab mejung ba
english: Wondrous blessings of all the sugatas throughout space and time,

transliteration: chöying namdak tendrel tobden migyurwa
english: Utter purity of the dharmadhātu and the unchanging power of interdependence—

transliteration: dengdir deshek tashi pün sum tsok gyur chik
english: May the auspiciousness of these sugatas abound here and now!

transliteration: punsum tsokpa ngawa ser gyi riwo dra
english: Possessing every excellence, like a mountain of burnished gold,

transliteration: jikten sum gyi gönpo drima sum pang pa
english: Lord of the three worlds who has abandoned the three types of flaw,

transliteration: sangyé pema nam gyé dap dré chen ngawa
english: Awakened One whose eyes are like lotuses in full bloom—

transliteration: tashi dé ni kyegu zhijé dangpo’o
english: This is the first auspiciousness, which grants peace to living beings.

transliteration: dé yi nyewar tenpé chok rap yo mepa
english: The teachings that He imparts are sublime and unchanging,

transliteration: jikten sum na drak shing lha dang mi chöpa
english: Famed throughout the three worlds, honoured by gods and humans alike,

transliteration: chö kyi dampa kyé gu nam la zhi chepa
english: The sacred Dharma which grants peace to all living beings—

transliteration: dé ni jikten gewé tashi nyipa’o
english: This is the second auspiciousness, which brings virtue to the world.

transliteration: dam chö denpa töpé tashi kyi chuk ching
english: Those who possess the Dharma and are rich with the fortune of learning,

transliteration: gendün mi dang lha dang lha min yön gyi né
english: The Saṅgha, worshipped by humans, gods, and demi-gods,

transliteration: tsok kyi chok rap ngo tsa shé dang pal gyi zhi
english: Most supreme of communities, modest, and glorious—

transliteration: dé ni jikten gewé tashi sumpa’o
english: This is the third auspiciousness, which brings virtue to the world.

transliteration: gangla serna nam chakpa
english: The one who has overcome greed and attachment,

transliteration: nam chom drima mé dzé ching
english: Who has eliminated every form of imperfection,

transliteration: tuk zhi nöpa mi nga dé
english: And whose mind is tranquil, incapable of harm—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: drenpa gangzhik drowa nam
english: The guide who helps all beings

transliteration: tarpé lam du juk dzé ching
english: To embark upon the path to liberation

transliteration: chö nam tamché tönpa dé
english: And who teaches all forms of Dharma—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: tönpa drowa nam kyi ten
english: The teacher and supporter of beings,

transliteration: semchen kün gyi dön gyi chir
english: Who, for the sake of all who live,

transliteration: gang gi dewa nga dzö dé
english: Came to master the state of bliss—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: kyobpa gangzhik jampa yi
english: The protector who, with a loving mind,

transliteration: tuk kyi drowa didak kün
english: Forever cares for all these beings,

transliteration: bu chik zhindu tak kyang dé
english: As if they were his only child—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: gangzhik khorwar drowa yi
english: The one who provides support to all beings

transliteration: semchen kün gyi ten gyur chik
english: As they wander through the wheel of life

transliteration: ling dang pungnyen gyurpa dé
english: And is to them a sanctuary and protector—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: gangzhik chö kün ngönsum gyur
english: The one to whom all dharmas are apparent,

transliteration: tsang zhing luwa mi nga la
english: Who is pure and incapable of deception,2

transliteration: sung tsang tsangmar dzepa dé
english: Whose words are pure and deeds are purifying—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: pawo chenpo gang kyepé
english: The great hero who, through taking birth,

transliteration: pün sum tsok dön jor gyur ching
english: Perfectly fulfilled abundant purpose

transliteration: döndrub tsok kyang drubpa dé
english: And achieved a multitude of aims—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: gangzhik kyepé sa nam ni
english: The one whose birth caused the land,

transliteration: naktsal chewa rab yö shing
english: Including forests, to tremble and quake,

transliteration: semchen tamché rabga dé
english: And brought joy to all sentient beings—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: changchub nyingpor shekpa na
english: The one who prompted six earthquakes

transliteration: sa dak nam druk yö gyur ching
english: As he approached the seat of bodhi

transliteration: dü yi mi der gyurpa dé
english: And who caused Māra to despair—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: chö kyi khorlo korpa na
english: The one who turned the Dharma Wheel,

transliteration: pakpé denpa nam sungpa
english: Explaining the truths of the Noble Ones,

transliteration: tubpé nyenpa gang jung dé
english: And gained a reputation as a Sage—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: yitrok gang gi mutek jé
english: The captivating one who conquered

transliteration: tamché chö kyi pam dzé ching
english: All tīrthikas by means of the Dharma,

transliteration: tsok kün wang du dzepa dé
english: And took charge of all communities—

transliteration: khyé la delek dzepar gyur
english: He will bring you happiness and well-being.

transliteration: sangye khyé la delek dzé
english: May Buddha bring you happiness and well-being,

transliteration: gyajin tsangpé lha nam dang
english: May Śakra and the Brahma gods as well3

transliteration: jungpo kün gyi delek ni
english: And all the worldly spirits too provide you

transliteration: khyé la taktu jin gyur chik
english: With happiness and well-being for evermore.

transliteration: sangye sönam tu dak dang
english: Through the Buddha's merit and power

transliteration: lha nam kyi ni sampa yi
english: And the intentions of the devas,

transliteration: khyé kyi dön dö gang yinpa
english: May whatever you wish for or desire

transliteration: dön dé dering drub gyur chik
english: Be accomplished now upon this very day.

transliteration: kang nyi khyechak delek shok
english: Two-legged creatures, may you be well.

transliteration: kang zhi khyechak delek shok
english: Four-legged creatures, may you be well.

transliteration: khyechak lam dro delek shok
english: You who are on journeys, may you be well.

transliteration: chir ong nam kyang delek shok
english: You who are returning, may you be well.

transliteration: nyinmo delek tsen delek
english: May the day be well and the night be well.

transliteration: nyimé gung la ang delek shing
english: May the hours of noon bring happiness too.

transliteration: khyechak küntu delek shok
english: May you always enjoy happiness and well-being,

transliteration: khyechak dikpar magyur chik
english: And may you never fall prey to evil deeds.

transliteration: sangye lha nam tong dak gi
english: Surrounded by thousands of gods,

transliteration: yongsu kor té shek dzé kyi
english: The Buddha now approaches—

transliteration: dang sem denpa nam yer chik
english: Let those who bear ill will be gone!

transliteration: nyingjé daknyi chen nam khö
english: And compassionate ones remain.

transliteration: sangyé rang sangyé nam dang
english: Through the truthful words of the Buddhas,

transliteration: drachom lobpé dentsik gi
english: Pratyekabuddhas, arhats and disciples,

transliteration: jikten mi pen jepa nam
english: Let all who would harm the world

transliteration: drongkhyer dir ni tong gyur chik
english: Depart and be banished from this city.

transliteration: semchen kün dang sokchak kün
english: All sentient beings, all living creatures,

transliteration: jungpo kün dang khyechak kün
english: All spirits, each and every one of you:

transliteration: dewa bazhik den gyur chik
english: May you experience only happiness.

transliteration: tamché né nam mepar shok
english: May you all be spared from sickness.

transliteration: kün gyi zang nam tong gyur chik
english: May you all encounter what is good

transliteration: gang yang dikpar magyur chik
english: And never fall prey to what is evil.

transliteration: jungpo gangdak dir ni lhak gyur ching
english: May all the spirits gathered in this place,

transliteration: sa dang barnang dak na nepa nam
english: Be it on the earth or in the sky,

transliteration: kyegu nam la taktu jam jé shok
english: Always show goodwill and kindness to all beings,

transliteration: nyin dang tsen du chö kyang chö gyur chik
english: And practise Dharma day and night!

transliteration: sönam di yi tamché zikpa nyi
english: Through this merit, may all beings attain the omniscient state of enlightenment,

transliteration: tob né nyepé dra nam pamjé shing
english: And conquer the enemy of faults and delusion,

transliteration: kyé ga na chi balong trukpa yi
english: May they all be liberated from this ocean of saṃsāra

transliteration: sipé tso lé drowa drolwar shok
english: And from its pounding waves of birth, old age, sickness and death!

transliteration: sangye dang changchub sempa tamché la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the Buddha and all bodhisattvas!

transliteration: dené chomdendé la ling zhipé wangchuk jungpö dakpo chenpo chewa tsikpa serkya zhejawé diké ché sol to
english: Then Piṅgala—lord of the four continents, ruler of beings with protruding fangs—addressed the Blessed One:

transliteration: chomdendé dak ni jungpo tamché kyi dakpo lak té dak ni ling zhipé jikten gyi kham na chipé jungpo tamché la tsewar gyi dekpar gyi chingwar gyi jikten gyi kham di né jikten gyi kham zhendu penpar gyi yenlak dang nyi lak nam nampar chöpar gyi lak so
english: “Blessed One, I am the sovereign of all beings. I bring harm to beings throughout the four-continent world system: I strike them, I bind them, and I cast them from this world into others. I sever their limbs and appendages.

transliteration: chomdendé gang gi tsedak trepar gyurpa na uk tong té uk dé ling zhipé jikten gyi kham küntu gengpar gyi ching
english: “Blessed One, when I grow hungry, I exhale, and my breath fills the entire four-continent world system.

transliteration: chomdendé dak mi dang mi malakpa tamché kyi zijin trokpar gyi lak té uk chenpö semchen nam rek ma tak tu dro né natsok dak jung lak so
english: “Blessed One, I steal the vitality of humans and non-humans alike. The very moment my great breath touches sentient beings, myriad diseases arise.

transliteration: chomdendé gang na rik ngak kyi gyalpo uk chenpo zhé gyiwa di chöpa der dak gi uk kyi mitsukpa dang jungpo nam tsewar migyurwa dang
english: “Blessed One, wherever Mahāśvāsa: The Noble King of Mantras is practised, my breath shall hold no power, and the beings there will remain unharmed.

transliteration: rik kyi bu am rik kyi bumo gang lala zhik gi sangye dang chö dang gendün nam la chak gyi né go am gul du tak té changwa der lung lé gyurpa dang tripa lé gyurwa dang beken lé gyurpa dang düpa lé gyurpé dro né nam jungwar mingyur par dak gi deng lenché dezhin shekpé chen ngar yidam tsal lak so
english: “If any son or daughter of noble family pays homage to the Buddha, the Dharma, and the Saṅgha, and wears this sacred text upon their head or around their neck, they will not suffer illnesses born of wind, bile, phlegm, or their combinations. I vow this henceforth before the Tathāgata.

transliteration: dak la sung shik sung shik
english: Protect me! protect me!

transliteration: dak gi né tamché rabtu zhiwar gyur chik soha
english: May all my diseases be completely pacified, svāhā!

transliteration: dak delek su gyur chik
english: May I have well-being and goodness!

transliteration: pakpa rik ngak kyi gyalpo uk chenpo zhejawa dzok so
english: Thus concludes Mahāśvāsa: The Noble King of Mantras.

transliteration: sangye dang changchub sempa tamché la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the Buddha and all bodhisattvas!

transliteration: drubpa tamché la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to all accomplished masters.

transliteration: sangye la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the Buddha.

transliteration: chö la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the Dharma.

transliteration: gendün la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the Saṅgha.

transliteration: changchub sempa sempa chenpo nyingjé chenpo dang denpa pakpa chenrezik wangchuk la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the bodhisattva, mahāsattva, the great compassionate, noble Avalokiteśvara.

transliteration: semchen tamché kyi dukngal selwa la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the one who dispels the suffering of all beings.

transliteration: semchen tamché dukngal lé drolwar dzepa la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the one who liberates all beings from suffering.

transliteration: semchen tamché kyi chingpa chöpa la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the one who cuts the bonds of all beings.

transliteration: semchen tamché la mijikpa jinpa la chaktsal lo
english: Homage to the one who grants fearlessness to all beings.

transliteration: dené jikpa mepa pakpa chenrezik wangchuk gi zhen gyi mi tubpé nyingpo jöpar ja o
english: Now, the fearless, noble Avalokiteśvara shall proclaim the heart mantra of Aparājita.

transliteration: lé kün jepa gewa té
english: It is the virtue of all actions,

transliteration: jungpo kün gyi jikpamé
english: It grants fearlessness from all spirits.

transliteration: dütsi lé ni dütsi jung
english: Nectar born of nectar,

transliteration: di ni lé kün jepa yin
english: It accomplishes all deeds.

transliteration: dra kün jikpar jepa té
english: It strikes fear into all enemies.

transliteration: tsö dang dezhin tabpa dang
english: It overcomes disputes and strife.

transliteration: zhenyang dré ni khorwa dang
english: It vanquishes foes who confront us,

transliteration: tsöpé nang du tsö jé dang
english: And brings an end to conflict in its midst.

transliteration: taktu dra dang trepa dang
english: It ever turns back adversaries.

transliteration: mukpar jé ching rengpar jé
english: It paralyzes and confounds them.

transliteration: mongpar jé ching dikpa sel
english: It bewilders them and dispels negativity.

transliteration: duk dang mé ni dengpar jé
english: It pacifies poison and fire.

transliteration: rim dang nyé dik tamché sel
english: It dispels all diseases and wards off evil.

transliteration: chomkün dang ni chu dang drul
english: It averts the dangers of thieves, floods, and serpents.

transliteration: milam ngenpa tamché sel
english: It dissolves bad dreams.

transliteration: jungpo tamché dokpa yin
english: It repels all harmful spirits.

transliteration: sangye changchub drenpa dang
english: It leads beings to buddhahood

transliteration: chö kün rabtu tönpa té
english: And teaches the entire Dharma.

transliteration: di ni rik ngak tutob chen
english: This most powerful vidyā-mantra

transliteration: zhen gyi mi tub sinpo jom
english: Conquers all indomitable demons.

transliteration: gang tsé rik ngak di changwa
english: When one holds this vidyā-mantra,

transliteration: dena sa di yowar gyur
english: Even the earth itself will tremble.

transliteration: jikme denpa zhejawé
english: This unsurpassed king of vidyā-mantras,

transliteration: rik ngak gyalwa lanamé
english: Known as “Fearlessness,”

transliteration: jikten gönpö sungpa té
english: Expressed by Avalokiteśvara,

transliteration: jikten sumpo kün gyi chö
english: Is revered throughout the three worlds.

transliteration: dené jikpa mepa chenrezik wangchuk gi dezhin shekpa jesu drenpar jé né rang gi nyingpo zhen gyi mi tubpa dezhin shekpa tamché kyi sungpa di mé so
english: Then, the fearless Avalokiteśvara, recalling the Tathāgata, spoke the heart mantra of Aparājita, proclaimed by all the tathāgatas.

transliteration: dené changchub sempa sempa chenpo jampa dang denpa pakpa chenrezik wangchuk gi changchub sempa mijikpa jinpa la diké ché mé so
english: Then the bodhisattva, mahāsattva, the kindhearted and noble Avalokiteśvara addressed the bodhisattva Bestower of Fearlessness:

transliteration: mijikpa jinpa ngön jungwa depé dü na jikten gyi kham gangé lung gi jema nyé depa na dezhin shekpa drachompa yangdakpar dzokpé sangye rigpa dang zhab su denpa semchen tamché la pendokpa zhen gyi mi tubpé wangchuk ö chejawa jikten du jung té dé lé dak gi didak tö so
english: “Bestower of Fearlessness, in ages past—beyond as many world systems as there are grains of sand in the Ganges—there appeared in the world a tathāgata, an arhat, a fully awakened buddha, perfect in wisdom and conduct, a benefactor of all sentient beings, known as the Invincible Lord of Light. From him I received this mantra.

transliteration: dé lé zung né changchub sempa nam dang semchen tamché la yang nyé do
english: “Since that time, I have shared it with all bodhisattvas and sentient beings.

tibetan: མི་འཇིགས་པ་སྦྱིན་པ། གཞན་གྱིས་མི་ཐུབ་པའི་སྙིང་པོ་འདི་ནི། ཡང་དག་པར་རྫོགས་པའི་སངས་རྒྱས་བདུན་པོ་རྣམས་པར་གཟིགས་དང༌། གཙུག་ཏོར་ཅན་དང༌། ཐམས་ཅད་སྐྱོབ་དང༌། འཁོར་བ་འཇིག་དང༌། གསེར་ཐུབ་དང༌། འོད་སྲུང་དང༌། ཤཱཀྱ་ཐུབ་པ་རྣམས་ཀྱིས་གསུངས་སོ། །
transliteration: mijikpa jinpa zhen gyi mi tubpé nyingpo di ni yangdakpar dzokpé sangye dünpo nampar zik dang tsuktor chen dang tamché kyob dang khorwa jik dang sertub dang ösung dang shakya tubpa nam kyi sung so
english: “Bestower of Fearlessness, this heart mantra of Aparājita has been proclaimed by the seven past, fully awakened buddhas—Vipaśyin, Śikin, Viśvabhū, Krakucchanda, Kanakamuni, Kāśyapa, and Śākyamuni.”

transliteration: zhen gyi mi tubpé nyingpo di ni dak sungwa dang zhen sungwa dang nyi ga sungwa dang
english: This heart mantra of Aparājita protects oneself, protects others, and protects both.

transliteration: drong dang drongkhyer dang drong dal dang jong dang yulkhor dang gyalpö podrang sungwa dang
english: It safeguards villages, cities, towns, regions, countries, and royal palaces.

english: It paralyzes hostile hands, averts battles, suppresses conflicts, and pacifies disputes.

transliteration: dra tamché dokpa chingwa tamché drolwar jepa tamché du zhen gyi mi tubpa o
english: It drives away all enemies, liberates from all bonds, and remains invincible in all situations.

transliteration: taktu lelo mepar ni
english: Whoever upholds this dhāraṇī,

transliteration: gangzhik zung di chang jepa
english: Without ever lapsing into laziness,

transliteration: dé la lhatsok tamché kyang

transliteration: dü küntu ni sungwar jé

transliteration: dé ni tak sung lhen ner duk

transliteration: jitar nyima sateng na

transliteration: ziji drak chang lhen né zhin

transliteration: dé la palyön jukpar gyur
english: Their fortune and happiness will increase,

transliteration: khadok dang ni tsé yang pel
english: Along with their vitality and lifespan.

transliteration: pakpa zhen gyi mi tubpa mijikpa jinpa zhejawa dzok so
english: Here ends Noble Aparājita Who Bestows Fearlessness.

transliteration: jikten drenpé tsowo tsepakmé
english: Buddha of Infinite Life, foremost guide for beings in this world,

transliteration: dü min chiwa malü jompé pal
english: Your glory overcomes all untimely death,

transliteration: gönmé dukngal gyurpa nam kyi kyab
english: You are a refuge for those of us who suffer without protection—

transliteration: sangye tsepakmé la chak tsal lo
english: To you, Buddha Amitāyus, I pay homage!

transliteration: jinpé tob kyi sangye yangdak pak

transliteration: mi yi sengé jinpé tob tok té
english: A lion among men, he has realized generosity’s strength.

transliteration: nyingjé chen gyi drongkhyer jukpa na
english: When entering the citadel of the compassionate ones,

transliteration: jinpé tob kyi dra ni drakpar gyur

english: When entering the citadel of the compassionate ones,

transliteration: tsultrim tob kyi dra ni drakpar gyur
english: The sound of the strength of discipline is heard.

english: “Through the strength of patience, the Buddha is perfectly sublime,
